summary:
Improving trust in crypto market making - Flowdesk is the leading market making as a service infrastructure provider for token issuers, exchanges & institutions.

 Regulated and transparent crypto financial services - Market Making

Liquidity provision solutions for protocol foundations, token issuers and exchanges

 Engineering the financial institutions of tomorrow - Blockchain will be the base of the financial infrastructure of tomorrow. Flowdesk is building the technology to trade efficiently, at scale, on and off chain.
